user_profile.name: Carlos Mendoza
user_profile.description: Carlos, a 40-year-old from Mexico, has a friendly demeanor but tends to be very reserved in his expression. With limited mobility and a cautious decision-making style, he approaches the task of finding a caregiver for his elderly father methodically, paying close attention to detail. Although he has beginner-level tech skills, he is adaptable and uses concise communication to navigate the process effectively from home.

task_profile.task: find a caregiver for an elderly person

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Ability to assist with mobility and daily activities
usage_scenarios: Daily companionship and support with meals
Help with personal hygiene and mobility assistance
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local agencies or online platforms for caregiver services

metadata.task: find a caregiver for an elderly person
